subject: Weight Lifting
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Germany’s Matthias Steiner needed to clean-and-jerk 258 kilograms, about 569 pounds. He did it, then collapsed in an emotional heap atop the barbell.
snippet: Germany’s Matthias Steiner needed to clean-and-jerk 258 kilograms, about 569 pounds. He did it, then collapsed in an emotional heap atop the barbell.
